definition: Hedong district of Linyi city 臨沂市|临沂市[Lin2 yi2 shi4], Shandong
river/CL:條|条[tiao2],道[dao4]
surname Dong
east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord
Hedong district of Tianjin municipality 天津市[Tian1 jin1 shi4]/Hedong district of Linyi city 臨沂市|临沂市[Lin2 yi2 shi4], Shandong
lit. the lioness from Hedong roars (idiom)/fig. refers to a shrewish wife or a henpecked husband
the river flows thirty years to the East, thirty years to the West (proverb)/change is the only constant
pinyin: san1 shi2 nian2 he2 dong1 , san1 shi2 nian2 he2 xi1
containing_words.word: 三十年河东，三十年河西

definition: shrew/see also 河東獅吼|河东狮吼[He2 dong1 shi1 hou3]

sentences.english: The damaged boats reached safety below the city. On the last day of April, the Union troop boats began carrying soldiers to the east side of the river.
sentences.chinese: 在4月的最后天，北方的运兵船开始向河东岸运兵。

sentences.english: It is located to the east of the Yellow River, and is also known as Hedong.
sentences.chinese: 坐落于黄河以东，也因此被称为“河东”。

sentences.english: Mordor Orcs now hold the eastern shore of the Anduin.
sentences.chinese: 魔多的半兽人，占领了安都因河东岸。

sentences.english: East of the river, strangers from across the seas were seen less seldom.
sentences.chinese: 而在河东岸，狭海对面的异乡人则少见的多。

sentences.english: Hedong salt merchants were an important part of Jin merchants colony.
sentences.chinese: 河东盐商是晋商群体的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: District People's Government in the city, No. 30 Ximianqiao Street River Road.
sentences.chinese: 区人民政府设在市桥街清河东路。

sentences.english: It stands on a hill to the east of the river.
sentences.chinese: 它位于河东岸的一个山冈上。

sentences.english: Yunchen salt pond is a bright pearl in He Dong region.
sentences.chinese: 运城盐池，是河东地区一颗璀璨的明珠。

sentences.english: During his tenure the five-year period, the area east Few floods .
sentences.chinese: 在他任职五年期间，河东一带地区很少发生水灾。

sentences.english: That is why that place near the Jordan is called Abel Mizraim.
sentences.chinese: 因此那地方名叫亚伯麦西，是在约但河东。

sentences.english: When Hedong had a bad harvest, I did likewise to save the people.
sentences.chinese: 河东收成不好时，我也这样做，来救那里的人们。

definition: land west of the Yellow river/Shaanxi, Qinghai and Gansu provinces

Fengxiang County in Baoji 寶雞|宝鸡[Bao3 ji1], Shaanxi

capital city and its surrounding area

Guanzhong plain in Shaanxi, valley of the Wei River 渭河
Longxi county in Dingxi 定西[Ding4 xi1], Gansu
Qinzhou district of Tianshui city 天水市[Tian1 shui3 shi4], Gansu
Dongping county in Tai'an 泰安[Tai4 an1], Shandong
